> **Filename:** 6868loop.mp4, 6868.gif
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7029529096535297286?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6868 by Tstaffor(Rewrite of an article by Cremo)
[[/<]]
-----
For some reason I wanted to do a vaguely 70s bathroom scene I don't know why. I guess it just felt fitting for some reason? It's... probably something I arbitrarily decided based on the color scheme I picked out hahaha.

 Anyways I LOVE the kind of goofy fridge horror-type articles and this one definitely falls in that category. There's a backstory that's just implied yet despite never being told it, you can pretty easily read into it. A very quiet sort of upsettingness. Go read it!

Also Tstaffor, I was already in the planning phase for this one when you messaged me so I couldn't do the one you requested just yet ðŸ˜­. I will try and ALSO do the one you requested eventually! It's on my list right now. I love getting requests from authors plugging their work! 

(SCP-6868 is a re-write of an article by Cremo!)

 
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
